parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: The ID of the resource. This parameter is required only when you set the Type parameter to `ecs`. If you specify multiple IDs, separate them with commas (,). You can synchronize up to 50 resources at a time.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the resource to be synchronized. Valid values: `ecs, slb, vpc, ram, and all`. These values are case-sensitive.
